tasks.release: git checkout -b production && git merge main && git push origin main production --tags
tasks.bump:major: git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split('.')[0] + 1).0.0"} | %{git tag $_} && deno task release
tasks.bump:minor: git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split('.')[0]).$([int]$_.split('.')[1] + 1).0"} | %{git tag $_} && deno task release
tasks.bump:patch: git tag -l --sort=-creatordate | select -First 1 | %{"$([int]$_.split('.')[0]).$([int]$_.split('.')[1]).$([int]$_.split('.')[2] + 1)"} | %{git tag $_} && deno task release
